resources.string: No more games at all. Please return to main menu!
At least two players are required!
Choose players out of the list

Just type in the players manually, each separated by comma and space (Alice, Bob, ...) and click the adjacent arrow button. Alternatively the contact button can be used to choose players out of your phone contacts. You can combine both procedures as well.
When games require arbitrary shots, that means shots without % alc./vol. declaration, the alcohol concentration does not matter. The players should think of a range before starting the game anyway.

By default the Unique mode is set. Clicking on Change Mode makes it possible to change to the Multi mode. In the Unique mode every game appears only once until no more game is remaining, whereas in the Multi mode games can appear repeatedly.

The game is based on drinking shots. If no shots are available or just not desired you should talk with the other players and determine another (non)alcoholic drink to consume every time the game shows up shot. You do not need any other special preparation to play the games.
To remove a player from the list you just have to keep clicking on the corresponding name for a while.

Each round one player will be chosen randomly and displayed downright. The current task is always related to this player, no matter who has actually clicked the challenge button. You can either locate your device on the middle of the table or pass it around. The task is assigned to all players if there will be no name downright.

Clicking on the button Start game in the main menu will start a new game with the players specified beforehand. Choosing Reset players out of the menu will delete all players from the list, such that you do not have to do this manually.

Whenever you choose Main Menu out of any menu you get back to the main menu and quit your current game. Only your player list will be stored, but if desired you can delete the whole list via Reset players in the menu.
Since this game features alcohol, please drink responsibly. You can play the game with soft drinks as well. Enjoy the game!
